attributes.action: Provide NHS staff that have supported and directly contributed during COVID19.
attributes.additional_details: Its really important that the government recognises and shows appreciation for those NHS staff, across all areas including nurses but also cleaners, catering staff, managers, leaders and admin teams that have all contributed to the NHS needs that ultimately has enabled those patients to be supported and cared for during difficult times. Staff have cancelled leave, committed over and above, worked long hours and given they're all, even when they are feeling at the end of their limits they have kept going.
attributes.background: To give something rewarding back to these workers. To offer one months salary (tax free) so they can reward themselves and/or one months additional annual leave entitlement with at least 80% salary (tax free) to enable them to recoup and get some quality time back in their lives once this is over.
